name: I'll Take You All On (10 player)
descr: Defeat Thorim, the Ancient Rune Giant and the Runic Colossus in 10-player mode.
tooltip:
I\'ll Take You All On (10 player)

Defeat Thorim, the Ancient Rune Giant and the Runic Colossus in 10-player mode.

Criteria:
- Defeat Thorim
- Participate in slaying Ancient Rune Giant
- Participate in slaying Runic Colossus
